# probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_from_probounds_data { #probounds.probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_from_probounds_data }

```python
probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_from_probounds_data(probounds_data)
```

Compute bounds for observational data from a crosstab.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name           | Type             | Description                                                                     | Default    |
|----------------|------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| probounds_data | polars.DataFrame | Crosstab generated by :func:`create_probounds_crosstab` for observational data. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type               | Description                            |
|--------|--------------------|----------------------------------------|
|        | dict\[str, float\] | Lower and upper bounds of the benefit. |
